name: Panic at the Museum (reneantunes, james.beninger)
description:
YOU'RE THE CURATOR OF THE HOTTEST MUSEUM IN TOWN, AND YOU NEED TO SAVE THE ART BEFORE THE PLACE BURNS DOWN. WHAT DO YOU SAVE? WHO CARES! ART IS PAIN!

Instructions

Move: WASD /  Arrow Keys / Gamepad

Grab / Drop: Spacebar / J / Gamepad Button / Mouse Click

Restart: R

  • Collect paintings and return them to the ARTS truck
  • Find a fire extinguisher and drop it to reduce your danger level and clear out some flames
  • If you get hit, you'll respawn at the last art dropoff point

Known Issues

  • It's rare, but you can get stuck in the walls if you hit at the wrong angle.  Press R to restart, sorry!
  • Performance drops off a bit near the end when the fires are out of control.  Chrome has better performance than Firefox if that helps

  • If the game doesn't fix your screen, click the Full Screen button at the lower-right of the game frame and it will scale to fit your screen

Want to rate this game?  Visit our Ludum Dare 50 page
